item.title: 7 Reasons you're not ready to be a Tech Lead
item.description: and what you can do about it - 1. You spend more time learning new technologies rather than Do you keep finding new technologies to create the next greatest thing? 2. You keep knowledge to yourself 3. You focus too much on tech not the business 4. You don’t work with other teams 5. You don’t develop others...
